thread.title: 9 Times Beyonce Looked ***Flawless While Pregnant With Blue Ivy
thread.title_full: 9 Times Beyonce Looked ***Flawless While Pregnant With Blue Ivy

author: Billboard Staff
title: 9 Times Beyonce Looked ***Flawless While Pregnant With Blue Ivy
text: Only The Queen could slay like she did in her "Countdown" video while pregnant. Gregg DeGuire/FilmMagic 009 Black-Carpet Baby Bump Beyoncé never seems to have a problem glowing, but showing up to the 2011 MTV Video Music Awards black carpet at the Nokia Theatre L.A. Live on Aug. 28, 2011, in Los Angeles with her baby bump, she was straight up beaming. Mike Coppola/Getty Images for Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week 004 009 Sister Sister Speaking of radiance, check out Beyoncé in her this brilliant gold dress attending the J.Crew Spring 2012 fashion show with her sister Solange during Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week at The Stage at Lincoln Center on Sept. 13, 2011, in New York City. Jim Spellman/WireImage 009 'Live at Roseland' Screening When Beyoncé goes for glamour, there's no stopping her. Here is she is hosting the screening of "Live at Roseland: The Elements of 4" at the Paris Theatre on Nov. 20, 2011, in New York City. Alo Ceballos/FilmMagic 009 Street Style Pirate chic? Yes, please. Beyoncé kept her clothes billowing when photographed in this look on Nov. 3, 2011, in New York City. Gilbert Carrasquillo/FilmMagic 009 Blue Hint Beyoncé offers an early hint at Blue Ivy's name with this shimmering all-blue look at the Beyonce Pulse fragrance launch in New York City on Sept. 21, 2011. Slaven Vlasic/Getty Images 009 Woman in White The loose white dress Beyoncé wore to the Beyonce Pulse fragrance launch at Macy's Herald Square on Sept. 22, 2011, in New York City manages to look comfortable while hugging her curves. Ray Tamarra/Getty Images 009 Blue Is Back Again with the beautiful blue! Here Beyoncé leaves a Midtown Manhattan office building on Oct. 24, 2011, in New York City, naturally leaving jaws dropping left and right.
